body:
According to the "Source code organization" section in [Developer notes](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/developer-notes.md), `using namespace` should be avoided. This commit removes all uses of `using namespace <xxx>` in all source files, including test and bench related files, ~~as well as the `univalue` library~~.

I have already done a same-binaries check (rerun on a868216 commit) which (I think) passes:

```Bash
$ ../bitcoin-maintainer-tools/build-for-compare.py c4522e71c7e1d8ecfd70112e9375b9d00d6733a8 a8682168795bb46ad1ec4fe43a4e7bf53ba6382c --patches "stripbuildinfo-prev.patch, stripbuildinfo.patch" --executables "src/bitcoind,src/bitcoin-cli,src/bitcoin-tx"
[...]
>>> [do_build] Copying object files...
>>> [do_build] Performing basic analysis pass...
>>> [do_build] Use these commands to compare results:
>>> [do_build] $ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
>>> [do_build] $ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/c4522e71c7e1d8ecfd70112e9375b9d00d6733a8 /tmp/compare/a8682168795bb46ad1ec4fe43a4e7bf53ba6382c
$ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
c40e2ec9172019ae6b6de6eba16bc1122bc190ae9b963c43b9f7f45497841489  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-cli.a8682168795bb46ad1ec4fe43a4e7bf53ba6382c.stripped
c40e2ec9172019ae6b6de6eba16bc1122bc190ae9b963c43b9f7f45497841489  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-cli.c4522e71c7e1d8ecfd70112e9375b9d00d6733a8.stripped
b3c762fdbca58c61a69d7bc2aa6434c65d9717c621aba3bf034e30a693f2f4d5  /tmp/compare/bitcoind.a8682168795bb46ad1ec4fe43a4e7bf53ba6382c.stripped
b3c762fdbca58c61a69d7bc2aa6434c65d9717c621aba3bf034e30a693f2f4d5  /tmp/compare/bitcoind.c4522e71c7e1d8ecfd70112e9375b9d00d6733a8.stripped
65bd142dedeb28c9a1b9589f79eac34c040443932db8ef5f63bbe4c8e7c4e48c  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-tx.a8682168795bb46ad1ec4fe43a4e7bf53ba6382c.stripped
65bd142dedeb28c9a1b9589f79eac34c040443932db8ef5f63bbe4c8e7c4e48c  /tmp/compare/bitcoin-tx.c4522e71c7e1d8ecfd70112e9375b9d00d6733a8.stripped
$ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/c4522e71c7e1d8ecfd70112e9375b9d00d6733a8 /tmp/compare/a8682168795bb46ad1ec4fe43a4e7bf53ba6382c
$ 

```

(This required a [modification](https://github.com/laanwj/bitcoin-maintainer-tools/pull/1) to https://github.com/laanwj/bitcoin-maintainer-tools because two separate patches were necessary)

I am open to ideas to make this less unwieldly if desired, such as splitting into multiple separate PRs.

The affected files and namespaces:
```
bench/bench.cpp:          benchmark
bench/coin_selection.cpp: std
bloom.cpp:                std
chain.cpp:                std [unused]
core_read.cpp:            std
core_write.cpp:           std
init.cpp:                 std, boost::filesystem [inside void CleanupBlockRevFiles()]
main.cpp:                 std

miner.cpp:                std
rest.cpp:                 std
rpc/blockchain.cpp:       std
rpc/client.cpp:           std
rpc/mining.cpp:           std

rpc/protocol.cpp:         std
rpc/server.cpp:           RPCServer, std
script/ismine.cpp:        std
script/script.cpp:        std
script/standard.cpp:      std
test/bloom_tests.cpp:     std
test/hash_tests.cpp:      std [unused]
test/multisig_tests.cpp:  std
test/net_tests.cpp:       std
test/pmt_tests.cpp:       std [unused]
test/rpc_tests.cpp:       std
test/script_tests.cpp:    std
test/sigopcount_tests.cpp: std
test/timedata_tests.cpp:  std [unused]
test/univalue_tests.cpp:  std
timedata.cpp:             std
txmempool.cpp:            std
utilmoneystr.cpp:         std
utiltime.cpp:             std [unused]
wallet/rpcwallet.cpp:     std
wallet/wallet.cpp:        std
```
title: [WIP] Refactor: Removes all uses of using namespace in all source files.
